actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide that essential property insurance is available at reasonable rates under state FAIR plans.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to limit the rates which may be charged for property insurance under State FAIR plans to the advisory rates set by the State licensed rating organization. Permits the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to allow higher rates upon a showing of extraordinary need.

titles.title: A bill to provide that essential property insurance is available at reasonable rates under state FAIR plans.
